name: ib-api-services-training-chatgpt-accelerator-payment
description: Process payment or invoice request for 2026 AI Accelerator enrollment
author: Costa Michailidis <costa@innovationbound.com> (http://www.github.com/wamoyo)

scripts.zip: zip -r lambda.zip index.js payment-confirmation.html payment-confirmation.txt invoice-request.html invoice-request.txt node_modules/ package*
scripts.create: npm run zip && aws lambda create-function --function-name $npm_package_name --description "$npm_package_description" --runtime $IB_NODERUNTIME --role arn:aws:iam::204617980925:role/lambda-default --handler index.handler --timeout 10 --memory-size 256 --publish --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy: npm run zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name $npm_package_name --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.logs:
aws logs filter-log-events --log-group-name /aws/lambda/$npm_package_name --region us-east-1 | jq -r '.events[].message' | tr '	' '
'
scripts.reset-env: f(){ aws lambda update-function-configuration --function-name $npm_package_name --region us-east-1 --environment Variables={$1} ;};f
